column4: alright guys my download is at 96 %, Im gonna go and let it do its thing....be back in a bit. :)
well my upgrade from feisty to gutsy didnt go so well... :/
gutsy is in pieces atm, as you've discovered
gutsy is not released - it's alpha, whereas feisty is released & stable
I know, I wanted to see for myself ...I decided to wait a while after reinstalling Feisty.. ;)
i have that opened in gedit, exactly what do i comment out?
oh, that would disable all dimming controls - no you should check power manager settings
when you open synaptic, its asks for a password, and the screen dims behind the password box, thats what I am trying to disable, the dimming of the screen.
you might find something in the gnome control - maybe
beryl is a point of difference with windows, it's totally superficial, but can impress your boss, who is clueless about linux
beryl is quite impressive, no doubt.
